keywords: TLS certificates that are not trusted or distrusted but can be used in path-building for server authentication
description:
A list of certificates that are not trusted or distrusted in Google Chrome
but can be used as hints for path-building. Certificates should be base64-encoded.

Example value:


name: CAHintCertificates
displayName: TLS certificates that are not trusted or distrusted but can be used in path-building for server authentication
